problem_text_cn: 如图,菱形ABCD中,∠B=60°,AB=2cm,E、F分别是BC、CD的中点,连接AE、EF、AF,则△AEF的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the diamond ABCD, ∠B = N_0, AB = N_1, E and F are the midpoints of BC and CD respectively, connect AE, EF, and AF, then the perimeter of △AEF is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是菱形,∴AB=AD=BC=CD,∠B=∠D,∵E、F分别是BC、CD的中点,∴BE=DF,在△ABE和△ADF中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}AB=AD\\∠B=∠D\\BE=DF\\\end{matrix}\right.\∴△ABE≌△ADF(SAS),∴AE=AF,∠BAE=∠DAF．连接AC,∵∠B=∠D=60°,∴△ABC与△ACD是等边三角形,∴AE⊥BC,AF⊥CD(等腰三角形底边上的中线与底边上的高线重合),∴∠BAE=∠DAF=30°,∴∠EAF=60°,∴△AEF是等边三角形．∴AE=√{3}cm,∴周长是3√{3}cm．故选:B．
